data: “When Helena awoke next morning she was immediately conscious of a great commotion both within and without the house.”
"When Helena awoke next morning she was immediately conscious of a great commotion both within and without the house."
Caine, Hall, Sir, 1853-1931; Woodville, Richard Caton, 1856-1927 [Illustrator]
